General.Name: Xinjiang Daqo New Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Daqo New Energy Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of polysilicon in China. It offers P-type single crystal coral and crystal dense aniseed materials, and P-type single crystal compound feeding materials; and polycrystalline loose bars, dense blocks, and loose bulk materials. Xinjiang Daqo New Energy Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is based in Shihezi, China. Xinjiang Daqo New Energy Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Daqo New Energy Corp.
General.Address: New Chemical Material Industrial Park, Shihezi, China, 832012
